column4: I'm trying to install firefox 1 in warty. I changed my sources to hoary and did a apt-get install mozilla-firefox and got this:  mozilla-firefox: Depends: libgnomevfs2-0 (>= 2.9.90) but 2.8.2-0ubuntu1 is to be installe
Worked fine with Thunderbird
use warty backports instead of hoary sources
don'twork with amd64 arch !
Seems like hoary ff package os the only way to get FF 1.0 in AMD64 warty
well it sounds like you can either make the full leap to hoary, use mozilla's binary installer, or build from source yourself
ok.
the mozilla installer don't work either.
unfortunately
something is missing and i don't know how to install it. Some library.
what library?
I'll check
./firefox-installer-bin: error while loading shared libraries: libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
that's odd
i know :/
that shared lib is in libgtk
oh ok. let's try install that
it should already be installed
ok, i'll do a dpkg -l|grep libgtk then
see what comes up
Well, it did return a bunch of stuff.
I had a fair bit of libgtk stuff installed.
ls /usr/lib | grep libgtk-x11 anything?
yes. libgtk-x11-2.0.so.0
